description: Removal of existing ground floor rear patio door and replace with window and includes removal of surrounding wood panel and replace with reclaimed stock brick, and removal of existing sliding door and wood panel on rear extension and replace with patio doors.
decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Full details including photographs and manufacturerâ€™s specifications or physical samples made available on site, of all the materials to be used on the external surfaces of the building, including, but not limited to the bricks, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before any work commences on site. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building under Section 16 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and National Planning Policy Framework, June 2019, Paragraphs 184 to 202; The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character, LP3 Designated Heritage Assets and LP4 Non Designated Heritage Assets.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial;
